summary: A horse recoloring mod that replaces the brown/white-markings horse with a The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess-colored Epona.
descriptionHtml:
>> Epona: Horse Recoloring by cicatrice

   This mod, by default, replaces the Windhelm/carriage horses (bay with white blaze and socks) with a The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess-colored Epona.

>> Install

   Use an unzipping program (e.g. 7zip, WinRar) to extract the files/folders into your Skyrim\'s data folder (within your Skyrim install directory).

   * For Steam users: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

>> Uninstall

   Remove the following files:

   * Data\\textures\\actors\\horse\\horse01.dds
   * Data\\textures\\actors\\horse\\horsemanetail.dds

>> Notes
  
   * Currently, without the Creation Kit, all horse manes and tails will be white if you use this mod as presented.
   * Not compatible with other horse recolor/texture mods.

If you want to change a particular horse to use Epona: Horse Recoloring, then change the \'horse01.dds\' filename (included with this mod) to the target horse\'s filename according to the list below:

DEFAULT TEXTURE NAMES & HORSE TYPE (within the .bsa):
horse01.dds = [Windhelm] - Bay with white blaze and socks (carriage horse)
horse02.dds = [Solitude] - Palomino
horse03.dds = [Riften] - Dapple Grey
horse04.dds = [Whiterun] - Black
horse05.dds = [Markarth] - Pinto

For example, if you have a Markarth horse already bought and want its colors to be Epona\'s, then rename the \'horse01.dds\' file included with this mod to \'horse05.dds\'.

DEFAULT TEXTURE & MANE/TAIL TYPE (within the .bsa):
horsemanetail.dds = black/dark brown
horsemanetail02.dds = white/cream

EPONA - HORSE RECOLORING CHANGED THE FOLLOWING:
* \'horse01.dds\' is a recolored version (Epona) of the Windhelm texture (Bay with white blaze and socks)
* \'horsemanetail.dds\' (as it appears in this mod) is actually just \'horsemanetail02.dds\' (white/cream) -- if you want a dark mane/tail on your Epona-colored horse, just remove the \'horsemanetail.dds\' included with this mod (this would also make all horse types have their \"correct\" mane/tail colors).
